doc:
May Wallace https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/May_Wallace 0 May Wallace (August 23, 1877 – December 11, 1938) was an American film actress. She appeared in 63 films between 1914 and 1939. Wallace was born in Russiaville, Indiana and died in Los Angeles, California, where she worked in Hollywood as a film actress. She often played supporting roles for producer Hal Roach in his Laurel and Hardy and Our Gang comedies, mostly in maternal roles. Wallace was married to Thomas W. Maddox until her death, they had one daughter and one son. She died of heart disease, aged 61. May_Wallace ( August_23_,_1877 – December_11_,_1938 ) was an_American_film_actress . She appeared in 63_films between 1914_and_1939 . Wallace was_born in Russiaville , Indiana and died in Los_Angeles , California , where she worked in Hollywood as a_film_actress . She often played_supporting roles for producer_Hal_Roach in his_Laurel_and_Hardy and Our_Gang_comedies , mostly in maternal_roles . Wallace was_married to Thomas_W._Maddox until her_death , they had one_daughter and one_son . She died of heart_disease , aged_61 .
